title: Moonlight
description:
Small platformer about carrying the moon to see the level, made for Alakajam 2 with theme 'You can't see everything'. Music played in an actual blue ukulele.

Got 2nd place in the jam.

title: RetroRift
description:
Small challenging platformer about completing the level twice, the second time avoiding clones that repeat what you did the first time, in reverse. Made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2 with theme 'rewind'.

Got 9th place in the jam.

title: Constellations
description:
Minimal puzzle about connecting stars. Made for Godot Wild Jam #21 with theme 'connection' and inspired by sudoku.

Got 29th place in the jam.

title: BDSM
description:
Zachtronics-like minimal programming puzzle about programming stateless robots to defuse bombs. Made for the 4th Kajam (month-long) with theme 'Artificial intelligence'.

Yes I know what BDSM means, it's intentional :D

title: The cards you're dealt
description:
Minimal roguelike that is basically Slay the Spire + Crypt of the Necrodancer. Made for Ludum Dare 41 Compo with theme 'Combine 2 Incompatible Genres'.

Got 12th place! :D

title: Quantic Cat
description: Sokoban-like puzzle with innovative mechanics made for TigerJ's OctoBear jam where you were supposed to theme the game around a scientific theory. The chosen one is, of course, Schr√∂dinger's cat experiemnt.

title: Sliced
description: Made for Disc Room game jam.

title: Parts
description: Platformer metroidvania about rebuilding a robot and escaping. Made for Global Game Jam 2020 with theme 'Repair'

title: Rook
description:
Survival chess game. made for Alakajam 7 with theme 'tower'.

Got 2nd place in the jam, 1st place in gameplay.

title: Drift
description: Simple 1-player driving game made to experiment with sprite-stacking tech

title: Sunlight
description:
Minimalistic tower defense about growing a plant to fend off bugs made for the 3rd Alakajam with theme 'Always growing'.

Got 1st place in the jam.

title: Tiny Tarot
description: A showcase of my pixel art tarot deck project.

title: Bullet Rain
description:
A platformer action bossfight about fighting off a mafia boss using an umbrella. made for Alakajam 6 with theme 'Duel'. Extremely hard.

Got 3rd place, 1st in graphics.

title: Merciless Gods
description:
A minimal management game about sacrificing people and keeping the gods happy. made for Ludum Dare 43 with theme 'Sacrifices must be made.

Got place 54, 12th in innovation.

title: Windmill Piano
description: A wonky musical instrument, inspired by a math video by 3Blue1Brown.

title: Gallery of Alien Bones
description: An artsy procedural sprite generator from random noise.

title: Spellfight
description:
A game where you're a wizard and you fight other mages in card duels. Made for Alakajam 5 with theme 'spellcasting' and inspired by Critical Role character Caleb Widogast.

Got 14th place in the jam, 2nd in graphics.

title: Fyre
description: A Pyre (Spuergiant games) demake.

title: Titan
description: A puzzle game where you create machines to harvest materials and build a laser.
team: 4 - Dev: J-Star Design: SpaceMonkey Story: Horrusius

title: 35mm
description: A puzzle platformer where you're an ink blob trapped in a 35mm film. Made for TigerJam with theme '35'. Got first place in the jam :)

title: Witch Support
description:
A small RTS about brewing potions to support your troops and defeat the monsters. made for the Heart Jam with theme 'Scarcity'.

Got 3rd place in 'theme' and 9th in 'fun'

title: Platformer Maintenance
description: A puzzle game about rewiring the level to help a character reach the exit.

title: The Scarlet Cypress Hotel
description: A game where you enter a creepy hotel to chat with strangers and potentially murder them.

title: Tree Golf
description:
A game where you play golf by growing a tree that shoots its seed. Made for Godot Wild Jam 20 with theme 'Every end is a new beginning'.

Got 1st place in the jam.

title: Tiny Chess
description: Pixel chess vs. AI

title: Orbital Swing
description: Scorechasing game where you control an astronaut that swims at the rythm of the music

title: Flipnseas
description: Flip tiles to lead your ships to the treasure. Made for GWJ with theme 'Invert' but couldn't submit cause we made the game in Unity

title: SNEKS
description: Grid puzzle game about getting snakes to goals. Made for GWJ 45
